sentence: Today's session closes with the NASDAQ Composite Index volume reaching the 10th place in the top ten list for this year.
The last time the index closed above 2.42 billion shares was on Jan 04 2017.
The total shares traded for the NASDAQ was over 2.42 billion.
Declining stocks led advancers by 2.23 to 1 ratio.
There were 908 advancers and 2021 decliners for the day.
On the NASDAQ Stock Exchange 45 stocks reached a 52 week high and 20 those reaching lows totaled.
The most active, advancers, decliners, unusual volume and most active by dollar volume can be monitored intraday on the Most Active Stocks page.
The NASDAQ 100 index closed down -.51% for the day; a total of -27.73 points.
NetEase, Inc. ( NTES ) had the largest percent change down (-4.36%) while Monster Beverage Corporation ( MNST ) had the largest percent change gain rising 12.76%.
The Dow Jones index closed down -.53% for the day; a total of -112.58 points.
Caterpillar, Inc. ( CAT ) had the largest percent change down (-4.28%) while Home Depot, Inc. (The) ( HD ) had the largest percent change gain rising .87%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
